name: Pig Pig
author: pigpigscorner
ingredients:
• 700g chicken - chopped into pieces

  • 1 large onion - sliced

  • 4 cloves garlic

  • 1 tbs ginger - grated

  • 3 star anise

  • 1 cinnamon stick

  • 5 whole cloves

  • 1/4 cup Shaoxing wine

  • 1 cup (or more) water

  • 2 medium potatoes - cut into chunks


Seasonings

  • 2 tbs oyster sauce

  • 1 tbs (or more) light soy sauce

  • 1 tsp dark soy sauce

  • 1 tsp sugar

  • 1 tsp white pepper
instructions:
• Mix together chicken pieces and seasonings, leave to marinade for about 30 mins.

  • Heat up a bit of oil in a pot. Add onions, fry until soft and translucent.

  • Add ginger and garlic, fry until fragrant.

  • Mix in star anise cinnamon, cloves, fry until fragrant.

  • Add chicken pieces, fry until chicken is slightly browned.

  • Pour in Shaoxing wine to deglaze the pot and let boil for awhile.

  • Mix in potatoes and just enough water to cover all ingredients. Let it simmer until gravy is

  • thickened (about 30-45 mins).

  • Thicken with corn starch slurry (corn starch + water) if the gravy is too runny.

  • Season to taste and serve with rice.
